name: bulldozer (itch) (CuprusCu)
description:
Bulldozer

You need to pull down from the construction site all black cubes.
Yellow cubes stay for construction needs.

Z  - view from the cabin
X  - 3/4 view
C - view from security cam
R - restart the level
SPACE - breakes
M - mute

You can also download the game to play in better resolution (zip-file).

The game is under construction. We need your comments and suggestions.
